about_the_game:
This is a small-to-medium RTS game that takes up less than 150MB on the hard drive, but it already has most of the elements required for a classic RTS game. You can collect resources, recruit soldiers, build buildings, deploy defenses or gather troops to attack the enemy, and play online battles on the LAN!

The resources in the game are divided into three types: gold, wood, and meat. You can send your soldiers to collect these resources.

These three resources have their own uses: gold coins are used to recruit human soldiers, meat is used to recruit goblin soldiers, and wood is used to build buildings.

Each soldier and building has different ability values ​​and special effects. And soldiers can jump onto the buildings of their own team, and different special effects will be obtained depending on the buildings.

Choose the map you want to play: the terrain, map size, resource richness, and distance between the camps will bring different gaming experiences.

You can freely adjust the difficulty: simply suppress the enemy, fight evenly matched, or take on the most difficult challenge.

Play the campaign alone or play online battles on the LAN, try to destroy castles everywhere in different modes, and win the Four Mini Kingdoms War!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Dig gold, chop trees, raise sheep, use these resources to recruit soldiers and build defenses.Wage war with the remaining three kingdoms, or play against friends in a LAN multiplayer game!
